parameters.name: CacheTtlMax
parameters.description: The maximum TTL period of the cached data retrieved from the origin DNS server. Unit: seconds. Valid values: 30 to 86400.

parameters.name: CacheTtlMin
parameters.description: The minimum time-to-live (TTL) period of the cached data retrieved from the origin Domain Name System (DNS) server. Unit: seconds. Valid values: 30 to 86400.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-describedomains?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0) operation to obtian the domain name.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the cache-accelerated domain name. You can call the [ListCloudGtmInstances](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/zh/dns/api-alidns-2015-01-09-listcloudgtminstances?spm=a2c63.p38356.help-menu-search-29697.d\_0) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English Default: **zh**

parameters.name: SourceDnsServer
parameters.description: The origin DNS servers. A maximum of 10 origin DNS servers are supported.

parameters.name: SourceEdns
parameters.description: Specifies whether the origin DNS server supports Extension Mechanisms for DNS (EDNS). Valid values: NOT_SUPPORT and SUPPORT.

parameters.name: SourceProtocol
parameters.description: The origin protocol policy. Valid values: TCP and UDP. Default value: UDP.
